name: Endless Room
description: «Endless room» is a horror game in which you have to find a way out of his house, where you're stuck. The house is constantly changing and telling you a story that happened in it.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 10, 8.1, 7, Vista, XP (32 и 64-разрядные) Processor: Intel Core i3 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Supporting DirectX 9.0c from NVIDIA or AMD ATI, with 1 GB of video memory. DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 600 MB available space Sound Card: Compatible with DirectX

reviews.review_text: The game is interesting but it fails in most ways. Props being too dark and hard to see, bugs causing you to get stuck on props along with the floor. Story is just ughh with no horror in the game
Once you get the hang of it and start finding the clues it's not bad, not the scariest game ever but the concept is pretty cool  8/10
